projects.title: Club Drama 2014
projects.description: Another Club Drama video, about my school's short play competition. Shot and edited in under 8 hours in time to show at the judging ceremony.

projects.title: Articheck App Demos
projects.description: I produced several videos for Articheck for their website to demonstrate a typical workflow to survey pieces of art using their app. • iPad (2015) • iPhone Version 2 (2014) • iPhone Version 1 (2013)

projects.title: Glass Envelope
projects.description: A narrative short film set in Cornwall about message in a bottle that helps a boy through an uncertain time in his life.
projects.long_description:
A narrative short film set in Cornwall about message in a bottle that helps a boy through an uncertain time in his life.

The film was over a weekend near Port Quin in Cornwall, using a Canon 5D mkIII and a 5D mkII, RÃ˜DE & Marantz sound equipment, an Atomos Ninja 2 and a variety of Canon lenses including the 50mm f/1.4, 50mm f/1.8 and 85mm f/1.8. The film was edited in Premiere and the grading was done in Davinci Resolve.

projects.title: This Happened
projects.description: I film the This Happened series of talks about people's projects in interaction design, previously at the V&A and now at ustwo studios. • This Happened #20 -

projects.title: School Event DVD Production
projects.description:
I filmed and produced DVDs for the following school plays and events (number of DVDs in brackets):

• Club Drama - 2014 (10)
• Summer Ceremonies - 2014 (70)
• The Seagull - 2014 (25)
• Club Drama - 2013 (15)
• Summer Ceremonies - 2013 (75)
• Julius Caesar - 2013 (30)
• Smike - 2011 (150)
• Ratz - 2011 (130)

projects.title: Summer in Dubrovnik
projects.description: A travel video about my summer holiday in Dubrovnik, used as a test film to see how Magic Lantern RAW could be edited in Premiere and then graded in Resolve.
projects.long_description: A travel video about my summer holiday in Dubrovnik, used as a test film to see how Magic Lantern RAW could be edited in Premiere and then graded in Resolve.

projects.title: Polaroid
projects.description: After a high school party gets out of hand, the only piece of evidence of a scandal is a single polaroid. Shot in one day in April, edited over about a week up until the deadline of My Rode Reel.

projects.title: Firefly Asia Conference
projects.description: Firefly asked me to edit the raw footage from their Asia Conference into 12 videos, ranging from 15 minutes to an hour an 15 minutes, some of which are available on Vimeo.

projects.title: After School
projects.description: I made a short horror film trailer for my school's competition in which it came second and the Short Shorts festival in which it won second in Sound Design and third in Best Director.

projects.title: Summer in Zermatt
projects.description: I made a short film about my holiday in Zermatt including some of my first attempts at astrotimelapse and some Steadicam work.

projects.title: SPS Fencing Advert
projects.description: An advert to encourage interest in my school's fencing society.

projects.title: Fruush Advert
projects.description: An advert to promote Fruush, a new type of energy drink and a Young Enterprise product.

projects.title: TEDxSPS
projects.description: I manned the primary camera for the filming of the TEDxSPS events that took place at my school. I also made a timelapse of the set-up.

projects.title: Perception
projects.description: A short film made with my friends with a cast of six, a crew of around ten, shot over four days and edited over three months.

projects.title: Club Drama 2012
projects.description: Every year at our school there is a day devoted to drama, where eight productions compete to win a competition. Shot and edited in under 8 hours, to be shown at the judging ceremony.

projects.title: SPS Leavers 2012
projects.description: Although I wasn't in the class that was leaving, I helped to make this commemorative video - a tour of the school shot in one take and featuring every student. I also made a full-length behind-the-scenes video of it.

projects.title: Transport for London
projects.description: A short timelapse film about the different types of transport in London. Filmed over a month for a school project all over Greater London with my 600D.

projects.title: Bath Timelapse
projects.description: Shot during my family's weekend in Bath. Includes my first attempt at HDR timelapse and slow motion.

projects.title: Club Drama 2011
projects.description: Every year at our school there is a day devoted to drama, where eight productions compete to win a competition. I helped to film a video that was shot and edited in under 8 hours, to be shown at the judging ceremony.
